name: The Test (SimonAshcroftGD)
description:
Your Choices Mean Everything.

The Test is a psychological simulation game based around player choices and decisions. All of your actions are recorded and then compared to every other player who has completed the test. Doing nothing is always an option too.

Developed entirely by Simon Ashcroft

Controls

Left Mouse - Interact
WASD - Move
C or Left Control - Crouch
